tool_description: This is a shopify proxy API for developers who wants to connect to their shopify account without a backend service.
name: Shopify Proxy
title: Shopify Proxy

api_list.name: Shopify Proxy
api_list.description:
This is a shopify proxy endpoint.  The user should pass the **shopify token** and **domain url** of their shopify account in request header . The shopify endpoint path and method(GET, POST, DELETE, etc..) should be pass as query param. 

This is a POST API endpoint, if your shopify endpoint does not require any body content (eg: GET) then you can pass body as empty object({}). for other method which require body content (eg POST,  PUT, PATCH, DELETE) you can pass the data in body field as normal.
